p:
C57BL/6J, Nlrp3
-/- , Myd88
-/- and Aim2
-/- mice were originally obtained from The Jackson Laboratory and then bred in-house at Missouri State University (MSU). All in vivo experiments were performed under biosafety level 2 conditions at the Missouri State University Vivarium. Ripk2
-/- , Trif
-/- , Mavs
-/- , Casp1/11
-/- , Asc
-/- , Tlr7
-/- , and Tlr2
-/- knockout mice were housed at St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital and have been reported previously [ 47– 49].
